entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
